titles.title: I'm a king, I'm a priest,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm a king, I'm a priest,
A child of the great I AM,
I'm a victor, more than a conqueror,
A child of the great I AM;
Be advised I'm energised
Down deep in the inner man
By believing things like I'm a king,
I'm child of the great I AM!
